Temporary Thread for Monsters that start with extra techs

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, July 21, 2004 - 05:34 pm:

I was reminded in chat by MRFury29 that some monsters, rares were mentioned, but other types may exist, that start with an extra tech. It seemed like it might make an interesting chart, so please post any monsters known to make have extras off CD that are not on the book versions. I need the breed name, disc it's from and the name of the extra tech and any extra characteristics.
